start, set in motion, paddle, row, send [out], issue, transmit, dispatch, let go, dismiss, set loose, make [noun + gtong] verbalizes nominal meaning, [comp adj la] gtong, make more --

let go, pass by; 1) to start, set in motion, to paddle, row, * out, issue, transmit, dispatch. 2) to let go, dismiss, set loose, send 3) [noun +] verbalizes nominal meaning 4) to make. dad gtong - devoted and generous
